MCParticleWriteEngine.cc

00001 #include "MCParticleWriteEngine.hh"
00002 
00003 #include "EVENT/LCCollection.h"
00004 
00005 #include "IMPL/LCGenericObjectImpl.h"
00006 #include "IMPL/MCParticleImpl.h"
00007 
00008 #include <cfloat>
00009 #include <climits>
00010 
00011 #define INVALIDF (-FLT_MAX)
00012 #define INVALIDI INT_MIN
00013 
00014 namespace marlin
00015 {
00016   void MCParticleWriteEngine::registerParameters()
00017   {
00018     _hostProcessor.relayRegisterProcessorParameter(
00019                                                    _engineName+"_prefix",
00020                                                    "MCParticleWriteEngine prefix to tree variables",
00021                                                    _enginePrefix,
00022                                                    std::string("mcp_") );
00023 
00024     _hostProcessor.relayRegisterProcessorParameter(
00025                                                    _engineName+"_inColNameMCParticle",
00026                                                    "name of MCParticle input collection",
00027                                                    _inColNameMCParticle,
00028                                                    std::string("MCParticle") );
00029   }
00030 
00031 
00032   void MCParticleWriteEngine::registerBranches( TTree* hostTree )
00033   {
00034     hostTree->Branch( (_enginePrefix+"startPos").c_str(),
00035                       & _startPos,
00036                       (_enginePrefix+"startPos[3]/D").c_str() );
00037 
00038     hostTree->Branch( (_enginePrefix+"endPos").c_str(),
00039                       & _endPos,
00040                       (_enginePrefix+"endPos[3]/D").c_str() );
00041 
00042     hostTree->Branch( (_enginePrefix+"PDG").c_str(),
00043                       & _PDG,
00044                       (_enginePrefix+"PDG/I").c_str() );
00045   }
00046 
00047 
00048   void MCParticleWriteEngine::fillVariables( LCEvent* evt )
00049   {
00050     LCCollection *inColMCParticle;
00051 
00052     try
00053       {
00054         inColMCParticle = evt->getCollection(_inColNameMCParticle);
00055 
00056         const int nElements = inColMCParticle->getNumberOfElements();
00057         if (nElements == 0) return;
00058 
00059         IMPL::MCParticleImpl* mcp = (IMPL::MCParticleImpl*)(inColMCParticle->getElementAt(0));
00060 
00061         const double *MCstart = mcp->getVertex();
00062         const double *MCend   = mcp->getEndpoint();
00063 
00064         for(int i=0; i!=3; ++i) {
00065           _startPos[i] = MCstart[i];
00066           _endPos[i] = MCend[i];
00067         }
00068 
00069         _PDG = mcp->getPDG();
00070 
00071       }
00072     catch ( DataNotAvailableException err )
00073       {
00074         std::cout <<  "WARNING: Collection " << _inColNameMCParticle << " not available in event " << evt->getEventNumber() << std::endl;
00075         for(int i=0; i!=3; ++i) {
00076           _startPos[i] = INVALIDF;
00077           _endPos[i] = INVALIDF;
00078           _PDG=INVALIDI;
00079         }
00080       }
00081   }
00082 
00083 } //namespace marlin
